key_points: The body of Robert 'Bob' Lowrey, a 46-year-old from Houston, was discovered in Wyoming.
Lowrey was last heard from on August 20 and found nearly a month later at the base of Teton Pass.
The cause of Lowrey's death is currently unclear.
The case gained attention partly due to the widespread coverage of Gabby Petito's case.
Public tips, influenced by the Petito case coverage, led authorities to Lowrey's last seen location.
Search teams, including dog units, found Lowrey's belongings during their search.
The search operation involved more than 75 miles of hiking and 22,500 feet of elevation coverage.
Teton County Search and Rescue expressed gratitude to volunteers and condolences to Lowrey's family.
Lowrey's family thanked the media and the public for their support and requested privacy.
A GoFundMe has been set up for Lowrey's children's education, with the family appreciating any level of contribution.
spokespersons: Teton County Search and Rescue (official statement)
